title: (x) corporate serif w/ ligatures & sans - OE SerifRoman (Mrs Eaves), OE Corporate {Lari Elovainio, Philipp Jüttner}
content:
Hi,

Does anyone know these two typefaces ?

Thanks in advance

Cheers  
Andrei

author: andrei_bva

comments.content:
And ’Conduit’, maybe?  
_( The sample is pretty small, but could be. )_

Edit-A-Bit: Nah, Its something else. Still looking.

Dav

The fonts are called OE Corporate and OE SerifRoman. They are most likely custom-made. Maybe you can emnail the company about it? Here is a PDF with the fonts in it.

[http://www.openeyes.de/fallstudie/fs\_optimal-systems\_web.pdf](http://web.archive.org/web/20080827234843/http:/www.openeyes.de/fallstudie/fs_optimal-systems_web.pdf "http://www.openeyes.de/fallstudie/fs\_optimal-systems\_web.pdf")

Yes. The OE Corporate is custom-made by me (2001). The Serif is a regular MrsEaves (Emigre) with MrsEaves SmallCaps. Just mixed together for an better usage.

Robert
